Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at California
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at California due to a mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at California due to a mechanical problem on a train. 

At this time also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #92 Foster Temporary Reroute at Foster/Kimball
ShortDescription: 92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Pulaski, Bryn Mawr and Kedzie: due to, street blockage near Foster/Kimball.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Pulaski, Bryn Mawr and Kedzie: due to, street blockage near Foster/Kimball.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #53 Pulaski Temporary Reroute at Pulaski/15th
ShortDescription: 53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, 16th, Kostner, Roosevelt, and Pulaski due to, street blockage at Pulaski/15th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Pulaski, 16th, Kostner, Roosevelt, and Pulaski due to, street blockage at Pulaski/15th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #60 Blue Island/26th Temporary Westbound Reroute near Randolph/Columbus
ShortDescription: Weastbound 60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted via Randolph, Columbus, Wacker and Michigan due to street blockage near Randolph/Columbus.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbond #60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted via Randolph, Columbus, Wacker and Michigan due to street blockage near Randolph/Columbus.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
